text: Ramón Hernández (born 1 July 1953) is a Cuban fencer. He competed in the team sabre event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Cuba Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in fencing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Fencers at the 1979 Pan American Games
title: Ramón Hernández (fencer)
